mapper.insert: INSERT INTO image (post_id, origin_name, server_name, file_size, upload_date) VALUES (#{image.postId}, #{image.originName}, #{image.serverName}, #{image.fileSize}, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE image SET origin_name = #{image.originName}, server_name = #{image.serverName}, file_size = #{image.file_size}, upload_date = now() WHERE image_id = #{image.imageId}
